name: The Bell Chimes for Gold
description: Maria is a skilled and dedicated herbalist who suddenly gets dumped by her mentor... for another pretty girl. “With your skills in crafting, you can just buy any man you want.” After getting turned down with such cruel words, Maria declares: "I'm gonna make a buttload of money and marry someone!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 640x690 Windowed Resolution is the Default
